JobTitle: Tech Lead Manager, Capacity Engineering and Analysis
JobFullDesc: Facebook’s global infrastructure footprint continues to grow rapidly. We are seeking a technology leader to drive Infrastructure capacity engineering and performance, as part of the Capacity Engineering & Analysis org (CEA). The Tech Lead Manager (TLM) of Capacity Engineering & Performance will lead team(s) of high caliber engineers to drive strategic and tactical development of both software and operational processes, for the entire Facebook production fleet, in a scalable and sustainable manner. The TLM will also lead cross-fleet service performance and efficiency efforts, and collaborate closely with cross functional partners in product/service groups of Facebook, infrastructure partner teams, data center operations, software engineering and systems & tooling engineering.This role will be actively engaged in multiple strategic initiatives to build one of the largest Internet services in the world with tens of billions of user requests, hundreds of exabytes of data, and thousands of giga bps of network flow!
